posts.post_content: Ah, yes. I have not seen this card before, but it seems it could work, but, like most of the older cards, the use is a bit narrow.

Ah, yes. I have not seen this card before, but it seems it could work, but, like most of the older cards, the use is a bit narrow.

Posted By: Dalek9 (6/22/2009 9:50:40 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: Well, at least his {T} ability is reusable, only problem is your relying on the fact that your opponent plays auras, and not just auras, crippling auras such as [Pacifism](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Pacifism) or [Pillory of the Sleepless](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Pillory of the Sleepless), personally I would much rather run [Disenchant](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Disenchant) or similar spells in most decks. The problem with this card is that it's mechanic is too slow and narrow to warrant a slot in most decks...also nothing is quite as hilarious as enchanting a [Miracle Worker](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Miracle Worker) with [Arrest](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Arrest) or [Prison Term](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Prison Term).
posts.html:

The problem with this card is that it's mechanic is too slow and narrow to warrant a slot in most decks...also nothing is quite as hilarious as enchanting a Miracle Worker with Arrest or Prison Term.
